import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { Form, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Header, { HeaderLeft, HeaderCenter, HeaderRight } from '../../../components/Dealer/Header'; import { TCPLogo, IconDownArrow, IconArrowLeft, IconDeleteNew, IconPreapprovalWaiting, IconPreapprovalDeclined, IconStatusConfirmed } from '../../../assets/images'; import { getDealersRequests, getFundingRequests, setSelectedFundingRequest } from '../../../redux/actions/admin'; import Loader from 'shared/Loader'; class AddDealer extends Component { state = { company_name: this.props.selectedDealer.company_name, email: this.props.selectedDealer.email, contact_email: this.props.selectedDealer.contact_email, phone: this.props.selectedDealer.phone, street: this.props.selectedDealer.street, city: this.props.selectedDealer.city, state: this.props.selectedDealer.state, zip: this.props.selectedDealer.zip, } componentDidMount() { this.props.getDealersRequests(); } handleArrowBack = () => { const { history } = this.props; history.push('/admin/dealers') } handleAddDealer = () => { const { history } = this.props; this.props.history.push(`/admin/addDealer`); } render() { const { company_name, email, contact_email, phone, street, city, state, zip } = this.state; return (
Dealer Name this.setState({ company_name: e.target.value })}>
Main Dealer User Email this.setState({ email: e.target.value })}> Dealer Contact Email this.setState({ contact_email: e.target.value })}>
Phone this.setState({ phone: e.target.value })}> ADDRESS Street this.setState({ street: e.target.value })}> City this.setState({ city: e.target.value })}> State Zip Code this.setState({ zip: e.target.value })}>
) } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ selectedDealer: state.admin.selectedDealer }); export default connect( mapStateToProps, { getFundingRequests, getDealersRequests, setSelectedFundingRequest } )(AddDealer);
